videos.title: C.Ronaldo got 4th Ballon d'Or
videos.description:
Disclaimer:
At Para, we are committed to creating spatial experiences that help people feel truly present in any space. Inspired by Apple’s vision of spatial computing, we seek to reconstruct how people engage with creative works in immersive ways. This video is based on the original work titled [Cristiano Ronaldo offers his fourth Ballon d'Or to the Bernabéu!] by [Real Madrid CF], and all rights remain with the original creator. Most of the videos on our platform are used under reuse allowed licenses, and some are adapted into 3D formats to offer new ways of experiencing and appreciating the creator’s work. Our goal is to help promote and celebrate the creator’s content through immersive formats. If you are the original creator and prefer this content not to appear on our platform, or if you experience any discomfort while watching, please contact us at "commu.para@gmail.com".
We respond to such requests promptly and respectfully.
